scripts.db-check-logs: bun run query --dev --q "SELECT * FROM (SELECT query, args, DATE(date / 1000, 'unixepoch') as date, error FROM query_logs WHERE DATE(date / 1000, 'unixepoch') > '2025-10-14' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 100) ORDER BY date"
